name: Bandit The Bee
description:
University of Tulsa CSG 1003 GDC 03: Bandit The Bee

Help Bandit the Bee travel through a newly-discovered honey comb with his fellow honey bees collecting honey for their winter food supply, but be careful...danger strikes when company arrives...fire ants.

Game instructions:

Objective: Collect honey, avoid fire ants...collect 10 honey drops to win

Navigation Bandit using arrows keys

Rotate Bandit using A and D keys

Destroy fire ants using the W key
